events.message: I received the wrong size and I would like to request a refund because the item does not fit and is unusable for me.
Case categorized under Refund based on customer request for money back due to wrong product size.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect product size.
Hello! I’m Emily from support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let’s get this sorted out for you as soon as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product received to help us process your refund quicker?
Sure, my order number is 458923 and attached is the photo showing the size tag clearly indicating the wrong size delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you can keep the item or return it at your convenience.
Thanks Emily, I appreciate how quickly you’re handling this. The option to keep or return the product sounds perfect.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Closing this support case as the refund was received and no further issues were reported.
